comments.author: Jose Martinez

comments.author: Trevor Higgins
comments.comment: It is mocked if the test extends AbstractMockTaTestCase, but since this particular test was checking each attribute individually I thought i'd leave it for the moment.......may revisit again when moving test to src/integration-test

comments.author: Jose Martinez
Trevor Higgins
comments.comment: That doesnt work in gradle build as the aspect as woven in at compile time with <ajc>. Also, as some tests use TA and some dont, this is the most reliable way to determine if aspect is running on this test (it may be compiled into the code, but mocked out in AbstractMockTaTestCase, so its only really on per test basis we can tell)
